name: Heroes of ages past
description:
Heroes of ages past is a 2d single player top-down action rpg with difficult combat, awesome loot,  tons of skills, and oh did I say tons of loot?? 

  • Fight your way through hordes of enemies as you advance through the game. 
  • Learn skills as you progress to destroy your enemies with style!
  • Build a small base where you can smelt, rest, respawn, teleport, craft, enchant, and more!
  • Craft tons of items to equip your hero. The more you craft, the better the item and the higher the chance for random stats on the item.
  • Items are randomized which means you will never get the same items twice in a playthrough.
  • Plenty of unique items to satisfy your need for being overpowered!
  • Follower system which lets you equip your follower with almost any item and followers level up with you and gain new skills as well!
  • Intelligent AI that will go around obstacles in order to try to rip your face!

Interested??? 

Try it out and let me know what you think about it!

** This game is under development and is by no means finished and polished. You may experience bugs, although none should be game breaking. If so, don't hesitate to let me know in the comments below!

**The video is showing some visuals of an older version, but the gameplay mechanics are the same
